name: 11-express3rd-partyapi
description: - Go to https://api.openweathermap.org and create an account - On the API keys menu, create a new key - Save the API key in a secure location since you will use it to access the service - Go to the API section - Subscribe to the "Current weather and forecast collection" - Look for the free option and get the API key - Consult the documentation at: https://openweathermap.org/current
